text: ۞وَلَوۡ رَحِمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرّٖ لَّلَجُّواْ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

translation.en: And even if We gave them mercy and removed what was upon them of affliction, they would persist in their transgression, wandering blindly
translation.id: (Dan sekiranya mereka Kami kasihani, dan Kami lenyapkan malapetaka yang menimpa mereka,554) pasti mereka akan terus menerus terombang-ambing dalam kesesatan mereka
